name: Digital Service Provider CRM
author: Best IT Solutions

sections.description:
Best Free WordPress Invoice Plugin with Quotation & Invoice Payment

The Invoicing Plugin for WordPress is a powerful tool designed to simplify the process of generating and managing invoices directly from your website. Whether you’re a small business owner, a freelancer, or running a large enterprise, this plugin helps streamline your billing operations with ease.

The plugin ensures that every invoice sent is professional and accurate. You can also send invoices directly to clients via email, track payment statuses, and generate reports for better financial management. The plugin integrates seamlessly with popular payment gateways like PayPal, Stripe, and others, offering clients multiple payment options.

Designed with flexibility in mind, this invoicing plugin caters to various industries and business models, allowing you to create detailed invoices for products, services, or mixed orders. Additionally, with its intuitive dashboard, you can easily monitor unpaid, overdue, and completed invoices.

Key Features

  1. Unlimited Invoices & Quotes Creation
  2. Custom invoice ID prefix
  3. PayPal payment gateway
  4. Custom Pay Now button link on the invoice
  5. Discount management
  6. Client email notifications for payment and reminders
  7. Secure, encrypted payment options
  8. Detailed reporting and invoice tracking
  9. Easy to Setup
  10. Invoice for WordPress is Compatible with all WP themes

This plugin saves time, reduces errors, and ensures that your billing process is always accurate and efficient.

License

This plugin is released under the GPLv2 or later license.

Support

For support or inquiries, please contact us at info@bestitsol.com.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the digital-service-provider-crm directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin settings through the ‘DSP Settings’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
What payment gateways are supported by this plugin?

The plugin integrates with several popular payment gateways, including PayPal, Stripe, and Bank Transfer. Additional payment gateways can be added through custom development.

How do I send an invoice to my client?

You can send invoices directly to your clients via email. The plugin automatically generates and sends the invoice once it’s created, with options for sending reminders for unpaid invoices.

Can I track invoice statuses (paid, unpaid, overdue)?

Yes, the plugin provides a comprehensive tracking system that allows you to view the status of each invoice. You can filter invoices by status (paid, unpaid, or overdue) and view payment history.

Does the plugin automatically calculate discounts?

Absolutely! You can configure coupon codes for the discount settings, and the plugin will automatically apply them to the invoices.

Is there customer support available if I need help?

Yes, we offer dedicated customer support. You can reach out to us via email for assistance with any issues or questions you have about the plugin.
